text:
The reference book is left open,
The mechanical pencil is rolling around.
The notebook cover is all wrinkled.
Probably because the drink is left there.

S-Sorry for the wait…!
Toru-chan, Madoka-chan…!

S-Sorry for being late…
Where's Hinana-chan…?

Oh, she went to buy something.
Something like that.

Oh, I see…!
Is everyone done with the assignments already?

Not at all.
Just taking a little break.
Well, more like taking a break the whole time.
